name: Mad Treasure
text: [When Attacking] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life to your hand: Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less to the top or bottom of your opponent's Life.

effect.text: You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life to your hand: Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less to the top or bottom of your opponent's Life.
